Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.server

Class MultiServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.MultiServer
public class MultiServer extends Object
This class is the main class of the server. It takes care of managing the various roles for connecting with clients and creating the appropriate threads.
Author:
Dario d'Abate

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MultiServer(int port)
    Constructor of the class that creates a socketServer Object and a thread that allows you to close the server process

  • Constructor Details

    • MultiServer

      public MultiServer(int port)
      Constructor of the class that creates a socketServer Object and a thread that allows you to close the server process
      Parameters:
      port - port number on which the server will listen

  • Method Details

    • stopServer

      public void stopServer()
      This method stop the server and close all active connections.

    • unregisterPlayer

      public void unregisterPlayer(String nickname)
      This method unregister a player from the server, deleting his nickname in the "database". If that nickname is not registered in the server, nothing happen
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of the player to be deleted from the server

    • unregisterPlayerFromReconnection

      public void unregisterPlayerFromReconnection(String nickname)
      This method unregister ALL the players of a game from the reconnection handler, due to a victory.
      Parameters:
      nickname - nickname of one of the players that belongs to a game

    • loginPlayer

      public void loginPlayer(ServerClientHandler clientHandler) throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException
      This method logs a player in the server the first time it connects.
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - client handler associated to a player.
      Throws:
      IOException
      ClassNotFoundException

    • removeFromLobby

      public void removeFromLobby(ServerClientHandler clientHandler)
      This method is used to reset the parameters set up by the first player and remove him from the server
      Parameters:
      clientHandler - client handler associated with the player

    • restartGame

      public void restartGame(Game game, ArrayList<ServerClientHandler> playersConnections)
      This method is used to instantiate a gameHandler that run oh his own thread. This method is used by the reconnection mechanism
      Parameters:
      game - game object that was created before
      playersConnections - list of client handler that was originally disconnected

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame(GameHandler gameHandler)
      This method is used to save a game into the disk
      Parameters:
      gameHandler - game handler object associated to the game that will be saved

    • broadcastStart

      public void broadcastStart(String msg) throws IOException
      This method is used to notify all the client in the connection list about the start of a game
      Parameters:
      msg - msg that will be sent
      Throws:
      IOException

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main class of the server. It creates a MultiEchoServer class that will run on an executor
      Parameters:
      args - args[0] contain the port number
